CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Heritage Fund relative to Aethelgard Cultural Council?
SRP.A: Meridian Heritage Fund is {below} Aethelgard Cultural Council in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard Cultural Council relative to Meridian Heritage Fund?
SRP.A: Aethelgard Cultural Council is {above} Meridian Heritage Fund in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cultural event funding?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aethelgard Cultural Council}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cultural event funding?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Meridian Heritage Fund}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Heritage Fund's minimum Cultural Event Funding in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Heritage Fund's minimum Cultural Event Funding is in {2002}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aethelgard Cultural Council's maximum Cultural Event Funding in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aethelgard Cultural Council's maximum Cultural Event Funding is in {2022}.

NC.Q: Was the total Cultural Event Funding in 2012 higher or lower than in 2017?
NC.A: The total cultural event funding in 2012 was {lower} than in 2017.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2001, did the total Cultural Event Funding experience a larger or smaller change than between 1997 and 2010?
NC.A: The change in total cultural event funding between 2000 and 2001 was {larger} than between 1997 and 2010.

NC.Q: Was the total Cultural Event Funding in 2006 higher or lower than in 2015?
NC.A: The total cultural event funding in 2006 was {lower} than in 2015.

NC.Q: Between 2012 and 2021, did the total Cultural Event Funding experience a larger or smaller change than between 2000 and 2021?
NC.A: The change in total cultural event funding between 2012 and 2021 was {larger} than between 2000 and 2021.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aethelgard Cultural Council} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aethelgard Cultural Council and Meridian Heritage Fund first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aethelgard Cultural Council and Meridian Heritage Fund first exchanged leading positions in {1995}.
